attributes.action: To seek, from Her Majesty the Queen, a Royal Pardon for one Guy Fawkes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Guy Fawkes (alias Guido Fawkes), born 13 April 1570 - died 31 January 1606, was executed for attempting to reform, and hold to public account, the members of the Houses of Parliament. Mr Fawkes was a man of vision, four hundred years before his time. Without the benefit of a second home allowance, and with not one grain of gunpowder or single match claimed on expenses he deserves recognition for his valiant attempt to reform the unreformable.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
